name: Hall of Repeat
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 47, where participants had 72 hours to make a game that fits the theme of "Stuck in a Loop".

Break the Cycle by taking down the cause of it. Get stronger by collecting upgrades and guns, take them with you when you die and use that strength to get through 10 randomly generated floors.

Controls:

WASD: Move
Right Mouse Button: Use Right Weapon
Left Mouse Button: Use Left Weapon
Enter: Restart
E: Pick up weapon (You will drop your currently equiped weapon)

Ludum Dare Page:   https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/$226657
